title: difference between AD and Bonus AD
body: The picture shows a bit, but when i'm on the wiki and an ability says it does +100% ad and then another says +75% bonus ad. what is the difference?

replies.body: So the first set of numbers like 45/80/115/150/185 are the baseline damage, where the second number is the additional damage based on your current attack damage value. Say you had 200 AD and the ability had +100% AD, it would then deal an extra 200 damage added on.
alright thank you, so the first one scales with items and all that right?
